skills.name: OWASP Top 10
skills.pattern: Injection, Broken Auth, XSS, Insecure Design, Misconfig, Vulnerable Components

skills.name: SQL Injection
skills.pattern: ' OR '1'='1, parameterized queries, ORM protection

skills.name: XSS Prevention
skills.pattern: Output encoding, CSP headers, sanitize HTML, HttpOnly cookies

skills.name: CSRF Protection
skills.pattern: CSRF tokens, SameSite cookies, verify origin

skills.name: SSRF
skills.pattern: Validate URLs, allowlist domains, no internal network access

skills.name: XXE
skills.pattern: Disable external entities, use JSON, validate XML

skills.name: Insecure Deserialization
skills.pattern: Validate input, avoid native serialization, use JSON

skills.name: Path Traversal
skills.pattern: ../../../etc/passwd - validate paths, chroot, no user input in paths

skills.name: SAST
skills.pattern: SonarQube, Semgrep, CodeQL - analyze source code

skills.name: DAST
skills.pattern: OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite - test running application

skills.name: Dependency Scanning
skills.pattern: npm audit, Snyk, Dependabot - CVE detection

skills.name: Secret Scanning
skills.pattern: GitLeaks, TruffleHog - detect keys, passwords in code

skills.name: Penetration Testing
skills.pattern: Reconnaissance, scanning, exploitation, reporting

skills.name: Bug Bounty
skills.pattern: HackerOne, Bugcrowd - responsible disclosure programs

skills.name: Security Headers
skills.pattern: CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options

skills.name: Content Security Policy
skills.pattern: script-src 'self', style-src, img-src, report-uri

skills.name: CORS Security
skills.pattern: Specific origins, credentials handling, preflight

skills.name: Cookie Security
skills.pattern: Secure, HttpOnly, SameSite=Strict, __Host- prefix

skills.name: Password Hashing
skills.pattern: bcrypt, Argon2, scrypt - salt, cost factor, never MD5/SHA1

skills.name: Encryption at Rest
skills.pattern: AES-256-GCM, envelope encryption, key management

skills.name: TLS Configuration
skills.pattern: TLS 1.3, strong ciphers, certificate management

skills.name: Key Management
skills.pattern: HSM, Vault, KMS - rotation, access control, audit

skills.name: API Security
skills.pattern: Rate limiting, input validation, authentication, authorization

skills.name: OAuth Security
skills.pattern: PKCE, state parameter, token storage, scope validation

skills.name: JWT Security
skills.pattern: RS256 > HS256, short expiry, refresh tokens, revocation

skills.name: Network Security
skills.pattern: Firewalls, VPNs, segmentation, zero trust

skills.name: Container Security
skills.pattern: Non-root, read-only, minimal base, scanning

skills.name: Cloud Security
skills.pattern: IAM, security groups, encryption, audit logs

skills.name: Security Compliance
skills.pattern: SOC 2, ISO 27001, PCI-DSS, GDPR, HIPAA

skills.name: Incident Response
skills.pattern: Detection, containment, eradication, recovery, lessons learned
